<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Xulgath Leader](/Monsters.aspx?ID=420)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Xulgath leaders are usually the strongest, most violent members of a community—although in some cases, particularly in larger groups, xulgath tribes are led by powerful demon cultists or other monsters who seek to use the xulgaths as servants or slaves.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Xulgath Leader](/Monsters.aspx?ID=420)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Xulgath" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=244" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 337</row>

**Perception** +9; darkvision

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10), [Javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (4)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 44

**Stench** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 30 feet. A creature that enters the area must attempt a DC 19 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is sickened 1, and on a critical failure, the creature also takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to all xulgaths’ stenches for 1 minute.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
greataxe +11 ([Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d10+6 slashing plus Weakening Strike

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +11,
**Damage** 1d6+6 piercing plus Weakening Strike

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +8 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Weakening Strike** <actions string="Single Action" />  The target must succeed at a DC 20 Fortitude save or become [enfeebled 1](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) (or [enfeebled 2](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) on a critical hit) for 1 round.

</column>

name: Xulgath Leader
